Issue.creator: bpbuch
Issue.summary: Use Ginkgo and Gomega to drive unit tests
Issue.description: The unit tests should match the patterns created in the Fabric project. For example, chaincode|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/tree/master/core/chaincode uses the chaincode_test package and Ginkgo/Gomega to drive unit tests. Private functions can still be tested using the same package for test if necessary.
